title: Travel insurance policies and coverage confirmations
dataVerified: Insured traveler names, trip details, coverage amounts, policy number, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/expired/claimed). Link to insurer system (policyholder only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake travel insurance. Domain binding verifies insurer. Coverage verification for trip cancellation/interruption/medical. Claim documentation. Multi-page: Travel insurance policies multi-page with terms.
